resource_data:

  <identifier>

    <entry>merli/1128</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Més pelat que una rata</string>
            <string language="en">Poorer than a church mouse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlechter als eine Kirchenmaus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plus pauvre qu'une souris d'église</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mais deficiente do que um rato de igreja</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Più povero di un mouse di chiesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φτωχότερος από ένα ποντίκι εκκλησιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre les comparacions lexicalitzades relacionades amb els animals. Conté una activitat introductòria, una activitat pràctica i una activitat d'avaluació. Està adreçada a alumnes de cicle mitjà.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on lexicalized comparisons using the names of animals. It includes an introductory activity, a practice exercise, and a self-assessment activity. Aimed at 8- to 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) lexicalized an Vergleiche, die Namen der Tiere verwendend. 
Sie schließt eine einleitende Aktivität, eine Übung und eine 
Selbstbewertung Aktivität ein. Angestrebte 8 zu 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
lexicalized en fonction des comparaisons en utilisant les noms des 
animaux. Elle inclut une activité préliminaire, un exercice 
pratique, et une activité de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment. 8 visés à 
10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) 
lexicalized sobre comparações usando os nomes dos animais. 
Inclui uma atividade introdutória, um exercício de prática, e
uma atividade do self-assessment. 8- visados a 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sopra lexicalized i confronti usando i nomi degli animali. 
Include un'attività introduttiva, un'esercitazione di pratica e
un'attività di valutazione di se stesso. 8 puntati su a 
10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) επάνω οι 
συγκρίσεις χρησιμοποιώντας τα ονόματα των ζώων. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια εισαγωγική δραστηριότητα, μια άσκηση 
πρακτικής, και μια δραστηριότητα αυτοαξιολόγησης. 
Στοχευμένος σε 8 στο 10-έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
